welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coatepeque, Guatemala! This charming city is known for its stunning lake and picturesque surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the beauty this place has to offer.

restaurants.name: La pampa Lago de Coatepeque
restaurants.description: La pampa Lago de Coatepeque is a argentinian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
